summary: The work spans three major initiatives: Benelux Premium Pricing migration (moving 6,000 Green Chef NL customers to HelloFresh Premium), One-Time Purchase (OTP) implementation for Factor with checkout and order history features, and The Pet Table portion percentage experiment with funnel and feeding guide updates. Multiple teams are working on web, iOS, and backend components with several UAT issues being resolved.

decisions.what: Move graduation banner work to Won't Do status
decisions.rationale: Deactivated state no longer exists for OTP users, making the banner unnecessary

decisions.what: Reuse isFirstTimeExposure logic from allergens experiment for portion percentage experiment
decisions.rationale: Statsig experiment setup with publicID has allocation issues out of the box

decisions.what: Hide payment reassurance banner for OTP variation
decisions.rationale: All OTP orders go through Charge at Checkout, making the 'You won't get charged before...' message irrelevant

decisions.what: Timebox investigation to 2 hours before escalating to plans squad
decisions.rationale: Internal Service Error needs quick triage to determine ownership

initiatives.name: Benelux Premium Pricing (MIO-1)
initiatives.description: Phase 1 (M0) focuses on migrating approximately 6,000 active Green Chef Netherlands customers to HelloFresh NL Premium tier due to Green Chef's closure, including plan switching, dynamic pricing, and deprecation notices

initiatives.name: One-Time Purchase (OTP) for Factor
initiatives.description: Implementing OTP functionality including checkout flow, cart creation, order history display, pricing updates, and SNS/OTP discount handling

initiatives.name: The Pet Table Portion Percentage Experiment (TPT-2175)
initiatives.description: Implementing portion percentage experiment across funnel, plans selection, and feeding guides with proper allocation handling and default selections

blockers.description: Internal Service Error in vms-place-order trace occurring since Aug 30
blockers.impact: Order placement failures, escalated to plans squad

blockers.description: Plan size does not correctly update in Plan Settings after modification
blockers.impact: Dashboard and meal selection show old plan despite success banner, subscription modified but not reflected

blockers.description: Waiting for updated feeding guide files from Jasmine and Anisha
blockers.impact: Cannot update PDF feeding guides to include portion percentage until files are ready

entities.name: Green Chef NL
entities.context: Being sunset and migrated to HelloFresh NL Premium, approximately 6,000 active customers affected

entities.name: HelloFresh NL
entities.context: Target brand for Green Chef migration with Premium tier offering

entities.name: Factor
entities.context: Implementing OTP (One-Time Purchase) functionality for non-subscription orders

entities.name: The Pet Table
entities.context: Pet food service implementing portion percentage experiment and feeding guide updates

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Experimentation platform used for feature flags and A/B testing, has allocation issues with publicID setup

entities.name: squad-plans
entities.context: Team responsible for plan-related functionality, escalation point for service errors

entities.name: Philip Tauro
entities.context: Working on Premium Upgrade Benefits Modal with dynamic data

entities.name: Ameek Singh
entities.context: Assigned to multiple iOS and Web tasks for Benelux Premium Pricing

entities.name: Emily Mendelson
entities.context: Working on multiple OTP UAT issues and investigating service errors

entities.name: Guhan Sundararajan
entities.context: Handling portion percentage experiment allocation and rendering logic

entities.name: Beatrice Dimarucut
entities.context: Product decision maker for OTP graduation banner and plan settings

technical_patterns.pattern: Feature flag gating for brand migration
technical_patterns.context: Using Statsig gates to control Green Chef deprecation notice visibility before full migration
Leveraging isFirstTimeExposure pattern from allergens experiment to work around Statsig publicID allocation issues
Identifying experiment variation from previous page allocation rather than triggering new events on funnel plans-selection page
Instrumenting useCreateOTPCartForCheckout hook for monitoring, debugging, and performance tracking in production
Managing campaign redirects (mail60, hellofresh) through infrastructure as code

technical_patterns.pattern: Conditional rendering based on order type
technical_patterns.context: Hiding payment reassurance banners and adjusting UI elements based on OTP vs SNS (Subscribe and Save) context
Feeding guide PDFs named after SKUs and hosted on S3 for easy updates

work_themes: One-time purchase vs subscription model expansion
Pricing transparency and dynamic pricing display
UAT bug fixing and quality assurance

dependencies.context: Plan type switching requires backend persistence and subscription modification APIs
Feature flag consumption for Green Chef deprecation notice
Waiting for updated feeding guide files before implementing portion percentage updates
Escalation path for vms-place-order service errors and plan modification issues
Multiple experiments depend on Statsig allocation working correctly, workarounds needed for publicID issues
Campaign redirects (mail60) require Terraform configuration updates
